data.title: Parminder Nagra Biography, Family, Career, Boyfriend, History, Height

data.text:
Is your favorite actress, Parminder Nagra, married or single?

The famous actress Bend It Like Beckham was previously married to film photographer James Stenson. She met her boyfriend the same year in the movie Bend It Like Beckham in 2002. After a seven-year relationship with James on January 17, 2009. Their wedding was officiated by her former ER co-star Maura Tierney and her ER co-stars attended. along with your family and other close friends.

On May 19, 2009, she gave birth to her first son, Kai David Sing Stenson. The duoâ€™s relationship did not last long and Nagra divorced on February 8, 2012. Their divorce was finalized in July 2013. After the divorce, she has not moved forward with their relationships. However, when asked about dating her in her future, she replied that he was struggling to meet the right person for her.

Caption: Parminder Nagra and her ex-husband James

Source: Daily Mail

How much did she earn from her acting career?

The actress has been earning a huge amount of money from her acting career. Also, the average salary for actresses ranges from $20k to $220k per year, including the number of jobs they get. Also, her fame and hard work added more to her net worth.
